text: well I won't go into details my
conversations with president elect Trump
I have offered my best advice counsel
and I think a lot of his views are going
to be shaped by his advisors and this is
something I have told them this is a job
of such magnitude that you can't do it
by yourself reality as a way to night
and back if you're not paying attention
to it it's important for me to take some
time to process this amazing experience
that we've gone through I want to do
some writing I want to be quiet a little
bit and not hear myself talk to learn
much if I saw systemic discrimination
being ratified in some fashion I think
would be something that would merit me
speaking out at the end of the day if we
work hard and if we're true to those
things in us that feel true and feel
right that the world gets a little
better each time this is not just a
matter of no drama Obama this is this is
what I really believe it is true that
behind closed doors I Chris more than I
do
